summary: The Osprey tiltrotor aircraft combines the capabilities of a helicopter with a turboprop airplane. The Marine Corps, Navy, and Air Force use the Osprey for missions that can require both aircraft types. But the Osprey has had 4 fatal accidents since 2022, resulting in 20 service member deaths and raising concerns about its safety. We found the services haven't fully resolved safety risks, like not...
title: Osprey Aircraft: Additional Oversight and Information Sharing Would Improve Safety Efforts
